rows.label: qst005801_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, take a look at this Brief History
of Alst book. This bit here.

rows.label: qst005801_msg0002
rows.name:
It says there used to be a kingdom
on the Isle of Sleeping Remains in
Liberalitas.

rows.label: qst005801_msg0003
rows.name:
Apparently it was destroyed by a
natural disaster or something.

rows.label: qst005801_msg0005
rows.name:
Come now, Rex...
Are you not even familiar with the
history of your own homeland?

rows.label: qst005801_msg0006
rows.name: D-don't look at me like that!

rows.label: qst005801_msg0007
rows.name:
Why would I know about some old
kingdom? It doesn't have much to
do with salvaging...

rows.label: qst005801_msg0008
rows.name:
You didn't know anything about
it either, right, Gramps?

rows.label: qst005801_msg0009
rows.name:
Hmm? I'll have you know there are
very few things I am not aware of.

rows.label: qst005801_msg0010
rows.name:
That said, I cannot remember
hearing of such a kingdom...

rows.label: qst005801_msg0011
rows.name:
Maybe this happen even before
Gramps was born?

rows.label: qst005801_msg0013
rows.name: Was this kingdom a wondrous place?

rows.label: qst005801_msg0014
rows.name:
Mmmmm... The book doesn't go
into that much detail.

rows.label: qst005801_msg0015
rows.name:
Then let us travel to the Isle of Sleeping
Remains! Perchance it may trigger
some long-buried memory within me.
